scripts.test: asc demo-uniswap-v2-idx-zkgraph/mapping.ts -o build/mapping.wasm --bindings esm && node src/test.js
scripts.compile: asc main.ts --lib ./demo-uniswap-v2-idx-zkgraph -t build/main.wat -O --noAssert -o build/main.wasm --disable bulk-memory --use abort=sdk/zkwasm/abort --target release --runtime stub
scripts.test-mvp: asc mvp_test/mapping.ts -o build/mapping.wasm --bindings esm && node src/test.js
scripts.compile-mvp: asc main.ts --lib ./mvp_test -t build/main.wat -O --noAssert -o build/main.wasm --disable bulk-memory --use abort=sdk/zkwasm/abort --target release --runtime stub
